ferrothorn:Sandstorm.NAME: Sandstorm
DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, deal #b4 damage to ALL enemies. NL Upon exiting this #yWeather, gain #b1 #yMetallicize.

ferrothorn:Rain.NAME: Rain
